text: Juan Carlos Sáez (born 7 June 1961) is a Spanish rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Spain Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Juan Carlos Sáez (rower)
